document_data.mainbody: '''Balance domain''' was a deity domain that granted [[divine]] spellcasters such as [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers related to the concept of balance. They could, once a day, use their wisdom to aid their defense.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters could cast ''[[make whole]]'', ''[[calm emotions]]'', and ''[[clarity of mind]]''. Those of some experience were able to use the ''[[dismissal]]'', ''[[mass sanctuary]]'', and ''[[banishment]]''. Only the most versed clerics of this domain had access to ''[[word of balance]]'', ''[[protection from spells]]'', and ''[[weighed in the balance]]''.
